snippet: The Madison Square Garden chairman responded to the fan’s critical email with one of his own, calling the fan a “hateful mess.”
abstract: Madison Square Garden spokesperson confirms that disparaging email written to New York Knicks fan was in fact written by chairman James L Dolan.
lead_paragraph: The Madison Square Garden chairman responded to the fan’s critical email with one of his own, calling the fan a “hateful mess.”

headline.main: Dolan Email Rips Irate Knicks Fan
headline.print_headline: Dolan Email Rips Irate Knicks Fan
